resources.string: Find recipes, save your favorites, \\nand follow step-by-step guides with ease \\n all in one place.

• 500g chicken (cut into pieces)\n
• 2 cups basmati rice (soaked 30 mins)\n
• 1 large onion (finely sliced)\n
• 2 tomatoes (chopped)\n
• 1/2 cup yogurt\n
• 3 green chilies (slit)\n
• 1/4 cup mint leaves (chopped)\n
• 1/4 cup coriander leaves (chopped)\n
• 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste\n
• 1 tsp chili powder\n
• 1 tsp turmeric powder\n
• 1 tsp garam masala\n
• 2 bay leaves\n
• 4 cloves\n
• 1 cinnamon stick\n
• Salt to taste\n
• 2 tbsp vegetable oil\n
• Saffron strands (soaked in 2 tbsp warm milk)

• 500g chicken (cut into pieces)
• 2 cups basmati rice (soaked 30 mins)
• 1 large onion (finely sliced)
• 2 tomatoes (chopped)
• 1/2 cup yogurt
• 3 green chilies (slit)
• 1/4 cup mint leaves (chopped)
• 1/4 cup coriander leaves (chopped)
• 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste
• 1 tsp chili powder
• 1 tsp turmeric powder
• 1 tsp garam masala
• 2 bay leaves
• 4 cloves
• 1 cinnamon stick
• Salt to taste
• 2 tbsp vegetable oil
• Saffron strands (soaked in 2 tbsp warm milk)
